abstract: JPMorgan Chase will not offer a job to Alan Fishman, chief executive of Washington Mutual, the struggling savings and loan it bought a week ago, according to press reports, which cited an internal memo.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase will not offer a job to Alan Fishman, chief executive of Washington Mutual, the struggling savings and loan it bought a week ago, according to press reports, which cited an internal memo.

headline.main: JPMorgan Poised to Sweep Out WaMu Executive Suite
